meeting_info.location: City Hall, Conference Room 6ES / Video Conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Monthly Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of minutes from January 4, 2024 meeting.

agenda_items.title: Community Development Division Report
agenda_items.description: This report may include updates to commission members and members of the public, regarding proposed committee meetings, agenda items, presentations, and updates for the Consolidated Plan.

agenda_items.title: Chair’s Report
agenda_items.description: This report may include general greetings and acknowledgements to staff, commission members and other members of the public; introduction of new commission members; additions/changes to committee assignments, scheduling of committee meetings and consideration of future agenda item.

agenda_items.title: Vice Chair’s Report
agenda_items.description: This report may include general acknowledgements to staff, commission members and members of the public.

agenda_items.title: CDC Economic Development, Housing, and Home Programs Committee Report
Items for Full Community Development Commissions’ Consideration
agenda_items.description: Consider and vote on removing the matter concerning Substantial Amendment No. 3 to the FY 2023-24 Annual Action Plan (Community Development Block Grant {CDBG} Reallocation) from the Economic Development, Housing, and Home Programs Committee and move the matter to the full CDC for further discussion and potential action.

agenda_items.title: Announcement
agenda_items.description: Announcements may include: Expressions of thanks, congratulations, or condolence; Information about holiday schedules; honorary or salutary recognition of public officials, employees, or citizens.
